Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Trump was the first U.S. president to visit the Western Wall, when in fact several other presidents have visited the site.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that President Trump was the first U.S. president to visit the Western Wall.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, as it is stated that other presidents have visited the Western Wall, just not while they were in office.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that other presidents, such as Barack Obama, George W. Bush, Bill Clinton, and George H.W. Bush, have visited the Western Wall.
Understate: The claim understates the visits of other presidents to the Western Wall by not acknowledging them as official visits while in office.
